name: speedcurve-deploy
description: Define and run SpeedCurve tests from the command line. With speedcurve-deploy, you use a `speedcurve.json` file to configure the tests that you want to run. Then, using a single command, you run the tests on-demand and optionally wait to receive results.
author: SpeedCurve <support@speedcurve.com> (https://speedcurve.com/)
